pages.name: Shale
pages.text: A small gem that can be used to make Gem Essence by giving her a Bucket of Gem Slush.
To create a Shale, throw a Stone Button into a puddle of Blue Gem Essence and wait three seconds, then a Shale will form.
Shale can be given a Bucket of Gem Slush and they will create a random color of essence. This will take about 10 seconds to complete.
